channel.title: CVE Feed for Silicon Labs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Silicon Labs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28391|2024-09-03T14:17:30.170Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server header parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. Specially crafted network packets can lead to code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-31247|2024-09-03T14:26:16.205Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server Host header parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-28379|2024-09-03T14:22:43.242Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server form boundary functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-27882|2024-09-03T14:20:08.305Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server form boundary functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-41093|2024-07-12T19:56:16.225Z -- silicon%20labs -- simplicity%20sdk
item.description: Use After Free vulnerability in Silicon Labs Bluetooth SDK on 32 bit, ARM may allow an attacker with precise timing capabilities to intercept a small number of packets intended for a recipient that has left the network.This issue affects Silabs Bluetooth SDK: through 8.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-22472|2024-06-04T17:52:56.713Z -- silicon%20labs -- z-wave%20sdk
item.description:
A buffer Overflow vulnerability in Silicon Labs 500 Series Z-Wave devices may allow Denial of Service, and potential Remote Code execution
This issue affects all versions of Silicon Labs 500 Series SDK prior to v6.85.2
running on Silicon Labs 500 series Z-wave devices.

item.title: CVE-2023-41093|2024-07-30T18:49:50.246Z -- silicon%20labs -- simplicity%20sdk
item.description: Use After Free vulnerability in Silicon Labs Bluetooth SDK on 32 bit, ARM may allow an attacker with precise timing capabilities to intercept a small number of packets intended for a recipient that has left the network.This issue affects Silabs Bluetooth SDK: through 8.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-22472|2024-08-01T22:51:09.827Z -- silicon%20labs -- z-wave%20sdk
item.description:
A buffer Overflow vulnerability in Silicon Labs 500 Series Z-Wave devices may allow Denial of Service, and potential Remote Code execution
This issue affects all versions of Silicon Labs 500 Series SDK prior to v6.85.2
running on Silicon Labs 500 series Z-wave devices.

item.description: Use After Free vulnerability in Silicon Labs Bluetooth SDK on 32 bit, ARM may allow an attacker with precise timing capabilities to intercept a small number of packets intended for a recipient that has left the network.This issue affects Silabs Bluetooth SDK: through 8.0.0.
